price: Ey iman edenler! Sabrederek ve namaz kılarak Allah'tan yardım dileyin! Şüphesiz ki Allah, sabredenlerle beraberdir.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū is'taʿīnū bil-ṣabri wal-ṣalati inna al-laha maʿa al-ṣābirīna
